Class Space

java.lang.Object
greenfoot.Actor
Space
public class Space extends greenfoot.Actor
Represents a GameBoard space and its associated attributes (i.e., is it a reroll space or not, is it occupied by a given player's piece or not, etc.)
Version:
Final Version
Author:
bickfori@email.uscb.edu

    Initializes the attributes of each Space object

  • Constructor Details

    • Space

      public Space(boolean rerollSpace)
      Initializes the attributes of each Space object
      Parameters:
      rerollSpace - true if this is a reroll space, false otherwise

  • Method Details

    • isOccupiedByPieceForPlayerIndex

      public boolean isOccupiedByPieceForPlayerIndex(int playerIndex)
      Getter method returns `true` if this space is occupied by a piece belonging to the player corresponding to playerIndex;
      Parameters:
      playerIndex - the index of the player whose piece may be occupying this Space

    • setOccupiedByPieceForPlayerIndex

      public void setOccupiedByPieceForPlayerIndex(int playerIndex, boolean occupied)
      Setter method updates the value of the current ("this") object's value of who currently occupies the space.
      Parameters:
      playerIndex - the index of the player whose piece may be occupying this Space
      occupied - true if this Space is now occupied by a piece belonging to the given player

    • isRerollSpace

      public boolean isRerollSpace()
      Getter method returns `true` if this space is a reroll space

    • setSpaceName

      public void setSpaceName(String name)
      Setter for the name of planets and stars as part of my tangential learning component
      Parameters:
      name - the name of each of the planets and stars on the gameboard.

    • getSpaceName

      public String getSpaceName()
      Getter for acquiring the name of each space to later be displayed for the player.
      Returns:
      spaceName the name of the space
